attribute-definition.description: Identifies whether the CC Token is generated by Cybersource
Check the checkbox if BIC filed is required.
To populate the supported bank list.
The Billing Agreement ID of the customer in PayPal

attribute-definition.display-name: CS DAV Delivery Address Verification Enabled
attribute-definition.description: This will enable Delivery Address Verification.
Allow customers to use an address that could not be matched with a valid address.
Some trace information will be stored in the impex folder on the server with the order ID as the name.

attribute-definition.display-name: CS Tax Calculation Default Product Tax Code
attribute-definition.description: Fallback tax code used when one is not assigned to a product.
If enabled, a unique ID (fingerprint) of the customer's environment will be checked to detect spam / fraud.

attribute-definition.display-name: CS Device Fingerprint Time To Live
attribute-definition.description: Time, in milliseconds between generating a new device fingerprint for a given session.

attribute-definition.display-name: CS Decision Manager OrderUpdate Lookback time
attribute-definition.description: Time, in hours to look back for new decisions when running the Decision Manager Order Update job.
Organization ID for the device fingerprint check.
Cyber Source Flag for Enable paypal expess in cart and Minicart page

attribute-definition.display-name: CS Tax Calculation Nexus States List
CS Tax Calculation No Nexus States List

attribute-definition.description: Save ParesStatus received as response from Pa Authenticate request and send it as param in ccAuth request call. This field should be enabled after verifying cybersource merchant account settings.
If this set to true , then address of buyer will be override by the shipping address provided in shipping page.
Set the background color of header in paypal.
if this set to true , buyer's shipping address will be suppress on Express Checkout pages in paypal.
This allows merchant to select payment option authorize or authorize + capture for Cybersource paypal payment methods
If this set to true, value of paypalReqconfirmshipping in Set Request will be set as 1 for confirm address in Paypal

attribute-definition.description: If this set to true, value of requestBillingAddress will set as 1 for requesting billing address from paypal.

attribute-definition.description: Enable Payment Tokenization on saved credit cards.

attribute-definition.display-name: CS SA Silent Post Access Key
CS SA Silent Post Profile ID
CS SA Silent Post Secret Key

attribute-definition.description: Preauthorization: 0 passed in request. Final authorization: 1 passed in request. Undefined authorization: omit authIndicator field from the request message
The Visa Checkout account API key specified in cyberSource business center (Alphanumeric; maximum 100 characters)
The color of the Visa Checkout button. standard or neutral.
Height of the button, in pixels, You must specify the height if you specify a value for width 34 47 94

attribute-definition.display-name: CyberSource Visa Button display on minicart and cart
attribute-definition.description: CyberSource Visa Button display on minicart and cart

You can either specify size to display a standard size button, or you can specify height and width to specify a custom size. If you do not specify size or both height and width, the button size is 213 pixels. If you specify height or width, the value of size is ignored 154 - small 213 - medium (default) 425 - High resolution or large

Width of the button, in pixels, You must specify the width if you specify a value for height -less than 477 if height is 34; default value is 154 -greater than 212 and less than 659 if height is 47; default value is 213 -greater than 424 and less than 1317 if height is 94; default value is 425

Override value for brands associated with card art to be displayed. If a brand matching the consumer's preferred card is specified, the card art is displayed on the button; otherwise, a generic button is displayed Select multiple ire required VISA MASTERCARD AMEX DISCOVER

Use profile's name, created externally by a merchant whom Visa Checkout uses to populate settings, such as accepted card brands and shipping regions. The properties set in this profile override properties in the merchant's current profile. (Alphanumeric; maximum 50 characters)
The secret key specified VISA Checkout account profile
Indicate whether Tell Me More Link to be displayed with VISA button true (default) false

Whether Verified by Visa (VbV) is active for this transaction. If Verified by Visa is configured, you can use threeDSActive to deactivate it for the transaction; otherwise, VbV will be active if it has been configured

Whether a Verified by Visa (VbV) consumer authentication prompt is suppressed for this transaction. If true, VbV authentication is performed only when it is possible to do so without the consumer prompt. true - Do not display a consumer prompt. false - Allow a consumer prompt
Cyber Source Flag to Enable Visa Checkout feature
Alipay Payment Type for Domestic as well as International Payment
